Why AI4ALL Armenia?

Armenia's tech landscape is rapidly evolving, and AI literacy is crucial for future readiness. Our program bridges skills gaps, fosters innovation, and promotes ethical AI development across all regions.

Inclusive Access

Reaching youth and teachers across all 11 regions of Armenia, ensuring no one is left behind in the AI revolution.

Practical Skills

Hands-on learning with real-world applications, preparing participants for immediate impact in their careers and communities.

Ethical Foundation

Emphasizing human-centered, ethical AI development to ensure responsible innovation and societal benefit.

AI4ALL Armenia

Democratizing AI education in Armenia by empowering youth (15-29) and teachers across all regions with essential AI skills. An initiative by the Enterprise Incubator Foundation (EIF).
